definitions.definition: Containing carbon dioxide gas under pressure, especially pertaining to beverages, as natural mineral water or man-made drinks.
Containing calcium carbonate , often as a result of mineral carbonation .

main_definition: Containing carbon dioxide gas under pressure, especially pertaining to beverages, as natural mineral water or man-made drinks.
secondary_definitions: ( mineralogy ) Containing calcium carbonate , often as a result of mineral carbonation .
